title: 0 xp
body: Why did i get 0xp for a game? I lost but isnt that supposed to still give me half of the xp of what a win would give me?

replies.body: I can take a look for you! Which champion and game mode was this, and around what time?  As a heads up, though, you won't get XP if you were marked as a leaver even if your team wins.  Let me know!

Oh my god that makes sense LOL, I left (alt f4) but when our nexus was about to be destroyed so I wouldnt see the defeat screen, Its kind of like a joke with my friends to show my tilt xd. The game was actually on my other account named Chibbie, it was a normals Riven game played on 11/16/2017, defeat!

P.S I think your answer solved the problem, thank you!
Thanks!  Good news.  :D  You were not marked as a leaver, but a visual issue showed no XP gain even though you did.  You received 133 XP for that match.  :)
I've just gotten 0 XP for an Aram game with a Janna, around 12.50am GMT+8. No idea why, leaving wasn't the problem. My XP progress bar haven't progressed, so I suppose that's definitely a 0 XP?
